name: Life After The Living
description: FPS Zombie Survival Game set in a post apocalyptic world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
